text: Alessandro Minuto-Rizzo (born 10 September 1940) is an Italian diplomat. He served as Deputy Secretary General of NATO from 2001 to 2007 and as acting Secretary General of NATO from 17 December 2003 to 1 January 2004. He served as ambassador of Italy to the Western European Union and to the Committee for Policy and Security of the European Union. He is member of the Italy-USA Foundation. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Politicians from Rome Category:Secretaries General of NATO Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors Category:Italian diplomats
title: Alessandro Minuto-Rizzo
